Hempstead.Hofstra University: Hofstra University is a private, non-profit, nonsectarian university in the village of Hempstead, New York, approximately 7 miles (11 km) east of New York City. Long Island's largest private college, Hofstra originated in 1935 as an extension of New York University (NYU) under the name "Nassau College – Hofstra Memorial of New York University at Hempstead, Long Island". It became independent Hofstra College in 1939, and gained university status in 1963.
